profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.7 Stream objects - 6.1.7.2 Filters
profile.description: All standard stream filters listed in ISO 32000-1:2008, 7.4, Table 6 may be used, with the exception of LZWDecode.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: All standard stream filters listed in ISO 32000-1:2008, 7.4, Table 6 may be used, with the exception of LZWDecode.
